mapper.select: /* 자동증가코드 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN CONCAT(#{column}, '_1') ELSE CONCAT(#{column},'_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(${column}, CONCAT(#{column}, '_'), -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS newCode FROM ${table} ;
mapper.insert: /* 휴가 종류 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_vacation_type (vacation_type_num, vacation_name, vacation_type, subtract_unit, vacation_use, member_num, reg_date) VALUES (#{vacationTypeNum}, #{vacationName}, #{vacationType}, #{subtractUnit}, #{vacationUse}, #{memberNum} , NOW());
mapper.select: /* 특정 휴가 종류 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_vacation_type WHERE vacation_type_num=#{vacationTypeNum};
mapper.insert: /* 휴가대분류 입력 */ INSERT INTO tb_vacation_category (vacation_category_num, vacation_category_name, member_num, reg_date, vacation_use) VALUES (#{vacationCategoryNum}, #{vacationCategoryName}, #{memberNum}, NOW(), #{vacationUse});
mapper.select: /* 특정 휴가 대분류 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_vacation_category WHERE vacation_category_num= #{vacationCategoryNum};
mapper.insert: /* 휴가 중분류 입력 */ INSERT INTO tb_vacation_sort (vacation_sort_num, vacation_sort_name, member_num, reg_date, vacation_use) VALUES (#{vacationSortNum}, #{vacationSortName}, #{memberNum}, NOW(), #{vacationUse} );
mapper.select: /* 특정 휴가 중분류 조회 */ SELECT * FROM tb_vacation_sort WHERE vacation_sort_num= #{vacationSortNum};
